name: Hidden Shadows
description:
note: the web version is laggier than the downloaded one. Download for the best playing experience!

A crossover between a tower defense game and a resource management game! As the Lightfather, your mission is to keep the Light Castle safe from the twisting shadows! However, the shadows camouflage themselves to look like innocent Lightlings, and the only way to expose them is to enter a limited time shadow dimension vision!

In this game, everything costs Shadow Essence. You must juggle your essence between shadow visions and buildings! Buildings cost essence to build, but in return have a positive effect on the gameplay - from passive essence income to slower enemies.

This game was made in less than 5 days for the 4th Interstellar Garden Game Jam! The theme was "another dimension", which is implemented through the different vision dimension that exposes your enemies.
